nodes.text: Tan Yuster's lightsaber was the personal weapon of Tan Yuster. Yuster was the Padawan learner of Agen Kolar and a part of the Jedi assault team in the Petranaki Arena. During the battle he was overwhelmed by B2-series super battle droids and killed. Kolar salvaged his fallen apprentice's lightsaber and kept its kyber crystal, which he added to his own weapon in tribute to Yuster.
